title.en: Merched y Wawr Cross Hands Branch Christmas Dinner 1978
title.cy: Cinio Nadolig Merched y Wawr Cangen Cross Hands ym 1978.

description.en:
Cinio Nadolig Merched y Wawr Cangen Cross Hands ym 1978.  Mae’r gangen bellach wedi cau.  
Rhes flaen - ?, Gwenith Davies, Lena Davies, Aeres Evans, Dora Hughes, Miriam Phillips, Tilly Culpitt, Eiry  Rowe
Ail Res – Let Rees, Olwen Rees, ?, Megan Price, Hannah Elvira Thomas, Rachel Roberts, ? Jenny, ? Bessie Owen
Rhes gefn - ? ? Olive Jones, Cissy Walters, ?
